trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as catalogs.
trans-unit.target: 用作充当目录的所有区域控件的基类。

trans-unit.source: Catalogs contain lists of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls that users can add to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 目录包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的列表，用户可将这些控件添加到网页。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class is a base class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类是一个基类，继承自该类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>类。

trans-unit.source: It provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones.
trans-unit.target: 它的派生区域提供了一组基本的行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class provides a unique user interface (UI) that enables users to add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls to Web pages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类提供允许用户添加一个唯一的用户界面 (UI)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和其他服务器控件添加到网页。

trans-unit.source: Controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, are the controls actually placed on Web pages.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>，是实际放置在网页的控件。

trans-unit.source: They act as containers for other controls, known as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, that create lists of server controls for users to add to a page.
trans-unit.target: 它们作为容器的其他控件，称为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，创建的用户添加到页上的服务器控件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Zones that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class can appear only when the page is in catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类可以仅当页面处于目录的显示模式时才显示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, and conversely, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls can reside only in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域只能包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，并与此相反，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件只能位于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。

trans-unit.source: The mechanism for adding server controls to a catalog is the following set of three controls that derive from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 将服务器控件添加到目录的机制是派生自基类的三个控件下面一组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>类。

trans-unit.source: Control
trans-unit.target: 控件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: 维护对已关闭在页面上的控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.
trans-unit.target: 这些控件可以由用户重新打开 （重新添加到页）。

trans-unit.source: Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 包含对在网页上的标记中的 Web 部件目录中声明的控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: These controls can be added to a Web page by users.
trans-unit.target: 这些控件可以由用户添加到 Web 页。

trans-unit.source: Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file to a catalog so that the control can be added to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 提供用户界面，用户将定义文件上载到目录，以便该控件可以添加到网页。

trans-unit.source: Definition files are XML file with a .WebPart file name extension that import settings for a control.
trans-unit.target: 定义文件是具有的 XML 文件。导入控制的设置的 web 部件文件名称扩展。

trans-unit.source: The control must be present on the server before the definition file can be imported.
trans-unit.target: 可以导入定义文件之前，该控件必须存在于服务器上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class has a number of properties that are useful for displaying catalogs of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类具有多个属性，可用于显示的目录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A> property references the verb that adds a selected control from the catalog to the page, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> property references a verb that closes the catalog and returns the page's display mode to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A>属性引用将所选的控件从目录添加到页上，该谓词时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>属性引用的谓词可关闭目录并返回该页面的显示模式，若要浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property references the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性引用的所有集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Several text-oriented properties, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>, override base properties to provide default text appropriate for catalogs.
trans-unit.target: 多个面向文本的属性，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>，重写基属性以提供适用于目录的默认文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A> property contains the text alongside the drop-down list control that allows users to choose which zone a control will be added to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A>属性包含允许用户选择控件的区域将添加到下拉列表控件旁边的文本。

trans-unit.source: Several other properties are included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 多个其他属性都将纳入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property is a unique string identifier for the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>属性是当前所选的唯一字符串标识符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.ShowCatalogIcons%2A> property indicates whether to show the icons that can be associated with controls by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.ShowCatalogIcons%2A>属性指示是否显示可通过设置与控件关联的图标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> property contains style attributes for the links to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls that are not currently selected in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>属性包含此链接到的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>在区域中当前未选择的控件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> property contains style attributes for a link to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control that the user has currently selected in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性包含样式特性提供了指向链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>用户当前选定的区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the properties, there are also some methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class, in addition to the standard event-handling and rendering methods inherited from other base controls, which are uniquely designed for the purpose of handling catalogs of controls.
trans-unit.target: 除了属性外，还有中的某些方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类，除了标准的事件处理和呈现方法继承自其他基控件，经过专门设计用于处理的目录控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A> method creates the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control in the zone, and also handles the rendering for the controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A>方法创建 chrome （即外围 UI 元素，如边框、 谓词、 图标和标题） 环绕每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>的区域中的控件，同时也处理控件的呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法是一个抽象方法; 派生的类重写它创建的所有实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>该区域中包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A> method can be called by a derived class if the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, and the derived class needs to recreate the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A>如果，可以由派生类调用方法的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域的变化某种编程的原因，以及派生的类中的控件需要重新创建该集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A> method loads the previously existing state for the check boxes next to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the catalog, whenever the page is posted back to the server; conversely, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState%2A> method saves the state of the check boxes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>方法加载以前现有状态复选框旁边<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在目录中，每当页回发到服务器; 相反，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState%2A>方法保存的复选框的状态。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks%2A> method provides all the rendering for the links to each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks%2A>方法提供给每个链接的所有呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>该区域中包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示几个声明性和以编程方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类。

trans-unit.source: Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 因为类为抽象类，这些代码示例使用派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>附带 Web 部件控件集，演示的属性和方法，它继承自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使你能够更改用户控件在网页上显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> control, and some code that demonstrates usage of some key <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class members.
trans-unit.target: 网页包含对引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>控件，并演示如何使用某些密钥的某些代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类成员。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is added to the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>添加到自定义控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>控件。

trans-unit.source: A description of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this code example is the user control that enables you to change display modes on the page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例的第一部分是使你能够更改页面上的显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是一个网页包含对的声明性引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>控件。

trans-unit.source: Near the top of the page are two `Register` directives--one for the user control, and one for the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 页面顶部附近是两个卡`Register`指令-一个用户控件，一个用于自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that below the `<asp:WebPartZone>` element is an `<asp: CatalogZone>` element that contains declarative references to the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and to an ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，下面的`<asp:WebPartZone>`元素是`<asp: CatalogZone>`包含对自定义的声明性引用的元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，并向 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: The zone also has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此外提供了不同的标记的区域和设置属性以确定其外观和行为。

trans-unit.source: Between the `<script>` tags in the page is a variety of event-handling code, most of which demonstrates the various programmatic uses of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> members.
trans-unit.target: 之间`<script>`中页面的标记是各种事件处理代码，其中大多数演示各种编程的将使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>成员。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control named `TextDisplayWebPart`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三个部分是自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件名为`TextDisplayWebPart`。

trans-unit.source: It is declared within the zone, and an end user can add it from the catalog to the page.
trans-unit.target: 在该区域中, 声明并最终用户可以将其添加从目录到页。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: For a demonstration of both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关这两种编译方法的演示，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: Note that for the code example to work, there is a setting you must add in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于该代码示例能工作，则必须在 Web.config 文件，以使导出 Web 部件描述文件中添加的设置。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example.
trans-unit.target: 确保你有此代码示例为 Web 页相同的目录中的 Web.config 文件。

trans-unit.source: Within the `<system.web>` section, make sure there is a `<webParts>` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup.
trans-unit.target: 在`<system.web>`部分中，请确保有`<webParts>`具有元素`enableExport`属性设置为`true`，如下所示的以下标记。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list box to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表框中，若要切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, you can see the two server controls that can be added from the catalog to the page, and you can also note in the UI the effects of the declarative and programmatic uses of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class members.
trans-unit.target: 声明性和以编程方式在目录是否可见时，你可以看到的两个服务器控件，可以从该目录添加到页上，并且你可以还请注意，在 UI 的效果的使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类成员。

trans-unit.source: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要开发一个自定义区域，以便承载<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />控件，你必须确定你是否想要提供区域模板支持。

trans-unit.source: A zone template is created by types that implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 通过实现的类型创建了一个区域模板<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />接口，并且如果你想要启用使用自定义区域以引用的页开发人员是必需的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />网页的声明性标记该区域内的控件。

trans-unit.source: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要区域模板支持，你应继承自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone" />类。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, if your custom zone and its <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，如果你自定义的区域并将其<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />控件会成为自包含，并将不使用任何页开发人员在区域模板中，以声明方式指定控件的选项以编程方式创建它们，然后你可以直接继承从<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />类。

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> class, you must override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts" /> method, and add the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server controls you want in your catalog to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果从继承<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />类，必须重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts" />方法，并添加<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />或您要在目录中其他服务器控件<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection" />对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化该类供继承的类实例使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is called when a derived class is initialized, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> class provided with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 初始化派生的类时，如调用的构造函数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>Web 部件控件集提供的类。

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.%23ctor%2A> constructor helps prepare the page to display the Web Parts catalog user interface (UI), by passing the appropriate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.%23ctor%2A>构造函数可帮助准备页后，可以显示 Web 部件目录用户界面 (UI)，通过传递相应<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the constructor passes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> object.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，构造函数传递<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables end users to add controls from a catalog to a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 对象的引用，最终用户使用该对象可以将控件从目录添加到 Web 部件页。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables end users to add controls from the catalog to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，最终用户可用来将控件从目录添加到网页。

trans-unit.source: The add verb is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A> property on a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 添加谓词引用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A>控件上的属性派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类。

trans-unit.source: The add verb adds a control that an end user has selected in the catalog to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 添加谓词添加到网页上目录中选择了最终用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the add verb appears in the user interface (UI) as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control, although it can also be a link or an image.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，添加谓词显示在用户界面 (UI) 中为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件，但它也可以是一个链接或图像。

trans-unit.source: The add verb is a zone-level control, meaning that although there might be several <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the catalog, the add verb applies to all the controls selected by the user and adds them to the selected zone.
trans-unit.target: 添加谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着，尽管可能存在多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>在目录中的控件，添加谓词应用于由用户选择的所有控件，并将它们添加到所选区域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A> property both declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A>属性同时以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.ApplyVerb%2A> property declaratively in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.ApplyVerb%2A>以声明方式在网页中的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example customizes the text for the verb.
trans-unit.target: 此示例自定义谓词的文本。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A> property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二部分演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A>属性以编程方式，通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用它。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, you can examine the customized text on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control for the add verb, and you can click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the apply verb programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，你可以检查自定义的文本上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件添加谓词中，并且你可以单击**启用或禁用谓词**按钮，以演示你可以通过编程方式访问应用谓词。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" /> class associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" /> 类的实例的引用，该类与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 区域关联。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" /> that is associated with the zone.
trans-unit.target: 与区域关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A> method is called, it creates one instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A>方法被调用时，它将创建的一个实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome>类与此实例用于所有呈现外围设备的用户界面 (UI) 元素 （也称为 chrome）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The chrome elements for an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control include its border and title text.
trans-unit.target: 个人的 chrome 元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件包括其边框和标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls provided with the Web Parts control set do not have header verbs by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> Web 部件控件集提供的控件在默认情况下没有标头谓词。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 区域中包含的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection" /> that contains all the individual <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 包含区域中所有单个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property provides a reference to a collection of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性提供对所有的集合的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: It references both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls that are added to the zone.
trans-unit.target: 它引用同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>附带 Web 部件控件集，以及任何自定义控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>添加到的区域的控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection is initially created when another method accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property, and the property calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 集合在最初创建当另一种方法访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性，并且该属性又调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> that is added to the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意对任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>，它将添加到的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>的实现中的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法必须具有分配给其 ID 属性的值，否则将集合分配给时引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property, iterate through the collection, and list the IDs of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性，循环访问集合，并列出的所有 Id<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, you can click the **List CatalogParts** button to demonstrate how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property can be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 如果该目录是可见的你可以单击**列表 CatalogParts**按钮，以演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>可以访问属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> being added to the collection did not have a value assigned to its ID property.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 的 ID 属性尚未赋值。

trans-unit.source: Switches the Web page from catalog display mode to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 将网页从目录显示模式切换到正常浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.Close%2A> method ignores any currently selected controls in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.Close%2A>方法将忽略在目录中的任何当前所选的控件。

trans-unit.source: It simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to return the Web page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 它只需调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件来返回到浏览模式的 Web 页。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables end users to close the catalog user interface (UI) and return the page to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 对象的引用，最终用户可使用该对象关闭目录用户界面 (UI) 并将页返回到正常浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables end users to close the catalog UI on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，最终用户可用来关闭网页上的目录用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The close verb is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> property on a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 关闭谓词引用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>控件上的属性派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类。

trans-unit.source: User can click the close verb in the zone footer.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以单击区域页脚中的关闭谓词。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the close verb, any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls the user has selected are ignored, the catalog UI closes, and the page returns to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击关闭谓词，任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>用户选定的控件将被忽略，将关闭目录 UI，并且将页返回到正常浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: The close verb is a zone-level control, meaning that its action applies at the level of the whole zone.
trans-unit.target: 关闭谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着其操作适用的整个区域的级别。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the close verb, any controls that have been selected but not added to the page are ignored, the catalog is closed, and the page returns to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击关闭谓词时，将忽略已选择但不是添加到页面的任何控件、 关闭目录时，和页返回到浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> property both declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>属性同时以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> property declaratively in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>以声明方式在网页中的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example customizes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Description%2A> property for the verb.
trans-unit.target: 本示例自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Description%2A>用于的动词的属性。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二部分演示如何访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>属性以编程方式，通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用它。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, by positioning your mouse pointer over the **Close** button, you can see its description text in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，通过将鼠标指针置于**关闭**按钮，您可以看到其工具提示中的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: You can also click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the close verb programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以单击**启用或禁用谓词**按钮，以演示你可以通过编程方式访问关闭谓词。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" /> object used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" /> 对象的实例，该对象用于呈现区域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 控件的外围用户界面 (UI) 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" /> that renders the peripheral UI elements for the zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈现区域外围用户界面元素的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A> 方法返回 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The chrome elements for an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control include its border and title text.
trans-unit.target: 个人的 chrome 元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件包括其边框和标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls provided with the Web Parts control set do not have header verbs by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> Web 部件控件集提供的控件在默认情况下没有标头谓词。

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control, so that you can minimize and restore the control programmatically if needed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，很可能设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制，以便可以最小化，还可以根据需要以编程方式还原的控件。

trans-unit.source: Provides a base method declaration that derived zones can override to handle the details of creating the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个基方法声明，派生的区域可以重写该声明，以便处理创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 控件的详细信息，这些控件包含在某个区域中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection" /> that contains the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls associated with the zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection" />，包含与区域关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method provides no implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法不提供任何实现。

trans-unit.source: It is intended to be implemented in a derived class, and should be used to create an instance of the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls contained in a zone, whenever the hosting Web page enters catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: 它旨在实现在派生类中，并应该用于创建的集合的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>承载网页进入目录模式时，在区域中，包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone.CreateCatalogParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method provides one example of an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone.CreateCatalogParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法提供的实现的一个示例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> that is added to the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意对任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>，它将添加到的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>的实现中的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法必须具有分配给其 ID 属性的值，否则将集合分配给时引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The method can create the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls from several sources: controls that are declared in persistence format within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> control, or controls that are persisted in various storage mechanisms, such as an XML file or a database.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可以创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>来自多个源的控件： 声明中的持久性格式的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>控件或将保留在不同的存储机制，如 XML 文件或数据库中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Developers who create custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls should inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone" /> classes, and override this method if they want to create a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" /> object to render their custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 创建自定义开发人员<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />控件应继承自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />或<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone" />类，并重写此方法，如果他们想要创建自定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome" />要呈现其自定义对象<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of child controls associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 创建与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 区域关联的子控件集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当区域不包含任何控件时显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含在空区域中显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 默认的区域性特定字符串由 .NET Framework 提供。

trans-unit.source: The string value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property is displayed when a Web page enters catalog mode, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone contains no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 字符串值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>属性将显示在网页上进入目录模式时，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域不包含任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>属性以声明方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the code example declares two `<asp:catalogzone>` elements, and the second one does not declare any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, though it does assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该代码示例声明两个`<asp:catalogzone>`元素和第二个未声明任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，但它会为分配到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, notice that below the first zone, which contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, the second zone appears, and displays the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property because it contains no controls.
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，请注意，下面的第一个区域，其中包含两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，第二个区域出现，并显示的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>属性因为它不包含任何控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the header area of a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置区域的页眉区的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the header text for the zone.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含区域的页眉文本。

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 默认的区域性特定字符串由 .NET Framework 提供。

trans-unit.source: The string value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A> property is displayed in the header area of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone, which is at the very top of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 字符串值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>属性显示在标题区域中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域，即的区域最顶部。

trans-unit.source: The text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A> property is displayed when a page enters catalog mode and the catalog user interface (UI) becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>页进入目录模式且目录用户界面 (UI) 变得可见时，将显示属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A> property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>属性以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the code example declares two `<asp:catalogzone>` elements.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该代码示例声明两个`<asp:catalogzone>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The second one does not declare any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, but both declare a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 第二个未声明任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，而是两个声明的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the second part of the code example, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A> property in the first zone is programmatically assigned to a different value.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例中的值的第二部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>第一个区域中的属性以编程方式分配给不同的值。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, notice the values of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A> property displayed in the header area of each zone.
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，请注意每个值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>每个区域的页眉区中显示的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can click the **Set Zone Text Properties** button, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A> property of the upper zone is set to the value assigned to it in the code.
trans-unit.target: 你可以单击**设置区域文本属性**按钮，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>的上部区域的属性设置为分配给它在代码中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text in a zone that provides directions for end users.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置区域中为最终用户提供说明的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the directions for end users.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含为最终用户提供的说明。

trans-unit.source: A default, culture-specific string is provided by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集提供的特定于区域性的默认字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> property is displayed just below the header area of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 字符串值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>属性显示下方的标头区<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。

trans-unit.source: The text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> property is displayed when a page enters catalog mode and the catalog user interface (UI) becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>页进入目录模式且目录用户界面 (UI) 变得可见时，将显示属性。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> property is to provide the user with general instructions on what to do when the catalog UI is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用途<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>属性是用户提供要执行的操作时显示目录用户界面的一般说明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>属性以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the code example declares two `<asp:catalogzone>` elements, and the first one declares a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该代码示例声明两个`<asp:catalogzone>`元素和第一个声明的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the second part of the code example, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> property in the first zone is programmatically assigned to a different value.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例中的值的第二部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>第一个区域中的属性以编程方式分配给不同的值。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, notice the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> property displayed in the header area of each zone.
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，请注意的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>每个区域的页眉区中显示的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can click the **Set Zone Text Properties** button, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> property of the upper zone is set to the value assigned to it in the code.
trans-unit.target: 你可以单击**设置区域文本属性**按钮，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>的上部区域的属性设置为分配给它在代码中的值。

trans-unit.source: Destroys the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 销毁与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 区域关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 控件集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A> method can be called by derived classes if the list of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone has changed for some reason, and the derived class needs to get an updated list of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A>可以由派生类调用方法，如果列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>与关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>由于某种原因，更改区域，并且派生的类需要获取更新的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The derived class should first call <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A> to destroy the current collection, and then the base class will call <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> as needed to create the updated collection.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类应首先调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A>若要销毁当前集合中，和基的类将调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>根据需要创建已更新的收集。

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: 以前保存的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state from a previous page request for control properties that should persist across postbacks even when view state is disabled on the control.
trans-unit.target: 加载上一次控件属性页请求的状态，即使控件禁用视图状态，也应在回发间保存控件属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="savedState" /> is not a valid control state.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 不是有效的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的主要标识符。

trans-unit.source: The collection of name/value pairs posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发布到服务器的名称/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes the state of the check boxes that correspond to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in the catalog, when the page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当页回发到服务器时，处理目录中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的对应复选框的状态。

trans-unit.source: This method, in contrast to the overridden base method, always returns <see langword="false" />, because the class does not expose any change event.
trans-unit.target: 与重写基方法相比，此方法始终返回 <see langword="false" />，因为该类不公开任何更改事件。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates through the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> controls to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls in the catalog have been selected by a user.
trans-unit.target: 此方法循环访问集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件来确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或已由用户选择在目录中的其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The selected items are assigned to an internal array, which is then processed to add the corresponding controls to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 所选的项分配给一个内部的数组，然后处理以将相应的控件添加到 Web 页。

trans-unit.source: The method is not designed to be called from your code; it is used internally by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 该方法不是从你的代码; 调用它由 Web 部件控件集在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: 以前保存的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.
trans-unit.target: 为某个区域加载以前保存的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadViewState%2A> method first calls the base method to load any previously existing state information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadViewState%2A>方法首先调用基方法，以加载任何先前存在的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Next, it adds the view-state data object containing the state information for the add verb, the close verb, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> object, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，它还将包含添加谓词，关闭谓词的状态信息的视图状态数据对象添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>对象，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>对象。

trans-unit.source: The size of the <paramref name="savedState" /> object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 对象的大小与当前视图状态对象的大小不相等。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers the page object so that the page requires control state.
trans-unit.target: 注册页对象以使页需要控件状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event and registers the page object so that it requires postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件并注册页对象以使其需要回发。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains style attributes for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls that are not currently selected in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象包含区域中当前未选 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 控件的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains style attributes for the controls that are not currently selected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含当前未选控件的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone, links are displayed for each type of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域，为每种类型的显示链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件： <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks one of the links, the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control becomes the selected control, and the child controls contained by that selected control become visible.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击相应的链接之一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件变为所选的控件，并包含该所选控件的子控件使其可见。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> property contains the style attributes for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls that are not currently selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>所引用对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>属性包含的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>当前未选择的控件。

trans-unit.source: Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still use it to set the underlying style characteristics for the unselected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该属性引用的对象是只读的但仍可以使用以设置未选定的基础样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>属性以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `<asp:catalogzone>` elements, and the first one declares a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一部分的代码示例声明了两个`<asp:catalogzone>`元素和第一个声明的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the second part of the code example, the text color for the unselected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls is set to a different value.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个部分的代码示例中的文本颜色未选定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件设置为不同的值。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, notice the style attributes of the unselected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls listed in the zone (by default, the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> control).
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，请注意未选定的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中列出的控件 (默认情况下，所选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>控件)。

trans-unit.source: You can click the **Change Part Link Styles** button to change the text color of the unselected controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以单击**更改部件链接样式**按钮可更改未选定控件的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: You can also click the links for the unselected controls, to see how the style attributes change when a control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以单击未选定控件，请参阅时选择了一个控件的样式特性的更改的链接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 包含该事件参数的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Carries out the actions associated with one of the zone verbs, or raises an event that posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 执行与某一区域谓词关联的操作，或引发发布回服务器的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the `eventArgument` parameter data indicates that the add verb or the close verb was clicked, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method carries out the action associated with the verb, such as adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to the page, or closing the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 如果`eventArgument`参数数据指示已单击添加谓词或关闭的谓词，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法执行与该谓词，例如添加关联的操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件添加到页上，或关闭目录。

trans-unit.source: If the method is being called for any other reason, then the base method is invoked to raise a postback event to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果出于任何其他原因调用方法时，然后调用基方法引发到服务器的回发事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to add custom verbs to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone, you need to override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" /> method to handle the event if a user clicks a custom verb.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要添加到自定义谓词<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />区域，您需要重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />方法来处理该事件，如果用户单击自定义的谓词。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the zone's content.
trans-unit.target: 接收区域内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the zone to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将区域呈现给指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.Render%2A> method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.VerifyRenderingInServerForm%2A> method, which verifies that an HTML form is rendered for the zone control at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.Render%2A>方法重写基方法从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类来调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.VerifyRenderingInServerForm%2A>方法，验证是否在运行时以 HTML 形式呈现为区域控件。

trans-unit.source: After the verification, the method then renders the remaining contents of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 验证之后，该方法随后将呈现该区域的其余内容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the zone's body content.
trans-unit.target: 接收区域的正文内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 重写基方法，以便呈现某个区域的正文区，该区域从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 类派生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> method renders the body area of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>方法将呈现的正文区，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域，也不能是页眉和页脚区域之间的主要内容区域包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> method overrides the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>方法重写中的基方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>类以提供地址布局和样式的专用的呈现属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。

trans-unit.source: The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including how many <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls are in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将呈现包含正文的全部内容的表并在该表中，设置不同的属性值，具体取决于各种条件，包括多少<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件是在区域中。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, a link is created for each control, and only the contents of the currently selected control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，为每个控件创建的链接和显示仅当前所选控件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Special style attributes are set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogPartChrome%2A> property for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control versus the ones that are not currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置特殊的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogPartChrome%2A>为所选属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制而不是当前未选择的。

trans-unit.source: If there are no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> method renders the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>该区域中的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>方法将呈现的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the contents of the links to the zone's controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，接收到区域的控件的链接的内容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the links to the individual <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈现到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 区域中单个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 控件的链接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks%2A> method renders links to the individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in a zone if there are multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks%2A>方法呈现链接到单个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制在区域中，如果有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The link for the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control is rendered differently so that it stands out from the unselected controls.
trans-unit.target: 当前所选链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>，以便它从未选定控件醒目以不同的方式呈现控件。

trans-unit.source: Developers can set the style attributes for the selected and unselected control links by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以通过使用设置的选定和未选定控件链接的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: The links to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in a zone are not navigational; they are for displaying the user interface (UI) of the controls.
trans-unit.target: 此链接到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件不是导航; 它们是用于显示控件的用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the link for a control, the UI for any other displayed control is hidden, and the UI for the selected control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击的控件的链接时，将隐藏任何其他显示控件的 UI，而显示为选定控件的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom class that inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> class, you can optionally override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建自定义类继承自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />类，可以选择替代<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: This method gives you programmatic control over how the links to <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> controls in your zone are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使你能够以编程方式控制如何链接到<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />呈现你的时区中的控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that renders the footer area for the zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈现区域页脚区的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the footer area for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 区域的页脚区。

trans-unit.source: The footer of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone is the bottom area of the zone that contains the zone-level verbs such as the add verb and the close verb.
trans-unit.target: 页脚<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域是包含如添加谓词和关闭的谓词的区域级别谓词的区域的底部区域。

trans-unit.source: In the underlying markup, a footer is simply a cell in an HTML table.
trans-unit.target: 在基础的标记中，页脚是只需一个 HTML 表中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderFooter%2A> method first creates the style attributes for the footer, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs%2A> method to render the add and close verbs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderFooter%2A>方法首先创建页脚，样式特性，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs%2A>方法呈现添加并关闭谓词。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that renders the verbs for the zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈现区域谓词的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the verbs in the footer area of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 区域页脚区中的谓词。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs%2A> method renders the add verb and the close verb within the footer area of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs%2A>方法呈现添加谓词和关闭的页脚区域中，谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method does not handle the rendering for any custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> objects that a developer adds to a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />方法并不处理的任何自定义呈现<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />开发人员将添加到自定义的对象<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />区域。

trans-unit.source: If you want to add custom verbs to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> class, you must inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> class, and override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method, which you can use to render the custom verbs for your zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要添加到自定义谓词<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />类，你必须从继承<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />类，并重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />方法，你可以使用它来呈现你的时区的自定义谓词。

trans-unit.source: You must also override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" /> method to handle the event when a custom verb is clicked by a user.
trans-unit.target: 你还必须重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />方法来处理该事件时被用户单击自定义的谓词。

trans-unit.source: Saves any changes in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> control's state that occur after the Web page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存在网页回发到服务器之后 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 控件状态发生的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含控件的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: If there have been no changes to the state, the method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态没有任何更改，则该方法返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState%2A> method is concerned with state data that is essential for a control's operation (such as an index or keyword) and is separate from the control's view-state data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState%2A>方法致力于至关重要针对控件的操作 （如索引或关键字），并且独立于控件的视图状态数据的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: The method first calls the base method to save the existing state data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 该方法首先调用基方法，以保存该控件的现有状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Next, it determines whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control in the zone is currently selected, by checking whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property has a value.
