trans-unit.target: 接下来，它确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>当前选定区域中的控件，通过检查是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>属性具有值。

trans-unit.source: If there is a selected control, the method updates the existing state data with the state data from the selected control, and then returns all the state data.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有选定的控件，该方法使用从所选控件的状态数据更新现有的状态数据，，然后返回所有的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState" /> method in a derived class so that you can update the saved control state for other custom objects in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState" />派生类中的方法，以便你可以更新该区域中的其他自定义对象保存的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred after a page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将页面发布回服务器之后，保存已发生的所有视图状态的更改。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zone control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 返回区域控件的当前视图状态。

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the zone, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与区域关联的视图状态，此方法将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveViewState%2A> method calls the base method to save the view state associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveViewState%2A>方法调用基方法，以保存与关联的视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。

trans-unit.source: Next, it saves any view state for the add and close verbs, as well as for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，它将保存为添加和关闭谓词，以及任何视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string as an identifier for the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串用作区域中当前所选 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 控件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A string that serves as the identifier for the currently selected control.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，用作当前所选控件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property allows you to set an identifier of your choice for the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>属性可以设置你选择的当前所选的标识符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: This does not change the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property value, so you can use this property for your own programmatic purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这不会更改控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性值，因此你可以使用此属性用于你个人编程目的。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to always carry out some programmatic action on the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control, this property enables you to access that control through a known value that you set in advance.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想始终执行上当前所选的某些编程操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制，此属性，你可以通过提前设置一个已知值访问该控件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>属性以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `<asp:catalogzone>` elements, and the first one declares a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一部分的代码示例声明了两个`<asp:catalogzone>`元素和第一个声明的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the second part of the code example, the text value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property of the currently selected control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个部分的代码示例中，文本值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>显示当前所选控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, click one of the links to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control to select it.
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，单击此链接到之一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件以选中它。

trans-unit.source: Then click the **Show Selected CatalogPart ID** button to display the property value.
trans-unit.target: 然后单击**显示选择 CatalogPart ID**按钮以显示属性值。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the value of the property is the value that was set declaratively for the zone.
trans-unit.target: 请注意该属性的值是以声明方式为该区域设置的值。

trans-unit.source: If you select the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone, the same value becomes the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property for each control when it is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件，相同的值将成为的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>当选中时每个控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property, the default value is always the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property for the currently selected control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你未设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>属性，默认值始终是值的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>为当前选定控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains style attributes for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> control that is currently selected in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象包含区域中当前所选 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> 控件的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains style attributes for the control that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含当前所选控件的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone, links are displayed for each type of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域，为每种类型的显示链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件： <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks one of the links, the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control becomes the selected control, and the child controls contained by that selected control become visible.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击相应的链接之一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件变为所选的控件，并包含该所选控件的子控件使其可见。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> property contains the style attributes of the link for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>所引用对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性包含的链接的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>当前选择的控件。

trans-unit.source: Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still use it to set the underlying style characteristics for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该属性引用的对象是只读的但仍可以使用设置为所选的基础样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `<asp:catalogzone>` elements, and the first one declares a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一部分的代码示例声明了两个`<asp:catalogzone>`元素和第一个声明的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the second part of the code example, the text color for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control is set to a different value.
trans-unit.target: 为所选的文本颜色的代码示例的第二部分，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件设置为不同的值。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, click the link for one of the listed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, and notice the style attributes of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，单击其中一个列出的链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，并注意到所选控件的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: You can click the **Change Part Link Styles** button to change the text color of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以单击**更改部件链接样式**按钮可更改所选控件的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: You can also click the links for the unselected controls, to see how the style attributes change when a control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以单击未选定控件，请参阅时选择了一个控件的样式特性的更改的链接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alongside the control in the catalog user interface (UI) that allows users to choose which zone to add their selected controls to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目录用户界面 (UI) 中的控件旁边的文本，该控件允许用户选择将所选控件添加到哪个区域。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display alongside the zone selection control.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，包含在区域选择控件旁边显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 默认的区域性特定字符串由 .NET Framework 提供。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog UI first appears, users can select one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>, that contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls that can be added to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当第一次出现目录用户界面时，用户可以选择其中一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>，包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或可以添加到网页上其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The user selects one or more controls, and can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control in the footer area of the catalog and choose the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control on the page in which to place the selected server controls.
trans-unit.target: 用户选择一个或多个控件，并可以然后使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制该目录的页脚区域中并选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>在其中放置所选的服务器控件的页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The text value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A> property is displayed alongside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control as a simple instruction.
trans-unit.target: 文本值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A>旁显示属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件作为简单的指令。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A> property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A>属性以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `<asp:catalogzone>` elements, and the first one declares a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一部分的代码示例声明了两个`<asp:catalogzone>`元素和第一个声明的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the second part of the code example, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A> property is changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例中的值的第二部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A>属性以编程方式更改。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog is visible, note the text displayed alongside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control in the footer of the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 目录可见时，请注意旁边显示的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>页脚目录中的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can click the **Set Zone Text Properties** button to change the text value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以单击**设置区域文本属性**按钮可更改属性的文本值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether server controls in the catalog display their associated icons in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示目录中的服务器控件是否在目录中显示其关联图标。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the icons associated with server controls in the catalog should be displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应显示目录中的服务器控件的关联图标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls that are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> 控件和包装为其他服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件在运行时具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is the URL to an image that is used as an icon to represent the control in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值是对用作一个图标来表示控件的目录中的控件的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.ShowCatalogIcons%2A> property indicates whether the icons associated with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and other server controls are displayed in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.ShowCatalogIcons%2A>属性指示与关联的图标是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>和其他服务器控件显示在目录中。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的主要标识符。

trans-unit.source: The collection of name/value pairs posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发布到服务器的名称/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> 类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> 方法，可以实现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an event should be raised to indicate that data has changed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当引发事件以指示该数据已更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The method simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class, which in turn processes the state of the check boxes in a catalog that correspond to server controls in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 方法只需调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类，它会反过来处理对应于目录中的服务器控件目录中的复选框的状态。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.
trans-unit.target: 曲目更改为区域控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.TrackViewState%2A> method first calls the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class to track the view state associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.TrackViewState%2A>方法首先调用基方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>与关联的类，以跟踪视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。

trans-unit.source: Next, the method begins tracking the view state for the add and close verbs, as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该方法将开始跟踪添加和关闭谓词的视图状态以及<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性。
